%dw 2.0
type customer = {| BillingAddress: {| country: Null, city: String, countryCode: Null, street: String, latitude: Null, postalCode: Null, geocodeAccuracy: Null, stateCode: Null, state: String, longitude: Null |}, Phone: String, Id: Null, "type": String, Name: String |} {"example": "{\"BillingAddress\":{\"country\":null,\"city\":\"Mountain View\",\"countryCode\":null,\"street\":\"345 Shoreline Park Mountain View, CA 94043 USA\",\"latitude\":null,\"postalCode\":null,\"geocodeAccuracy\":null,\"stateCode\":null,\"state\":\"CA\",\"longitude\":null},\"Phone\":\"(650) 867-3450\",\"Id\":null,\"type\":\"Account\",\"Name\":\"GenePoint\"}"}
